channel.title: openssl on zhili
channel.description: Recent content in openssl on zhili

item.title: Encrypt string using Openssl
item.description: Try this: 1 2 3 4 echo 'foo' | openssl aes-256-cbc -pbkdf2 -a -salt echo 'U2FsdGVkX1/QGdl4syQE8bLFSr2HzoAlcG299U/T/Xk=' | openssl aes-256-cbc -pbkdf2 -a -d -salt Run 1 2 3 openssl list-cipher-commands to list all available ciphers.
